public MorphologicalProcessor getMorphologicalProcessor()
Method : getMorphologicalProcessor Purpose : Returns the Morphological Processor object to for getting stemmed root forms of a word.

getIndexWord

public IndexWord getIndexWord(POS pos,
                              java.lang.String lemma)
                       throws JHWNLException
Return an IndexWord, which can be used to access all the Synsets with the specified POS containing the lemma as a word.

Throws:
JHWNLException

lookupIndexWord

public IndexWord lookupIndexWord(POS pos,
                                 java.lang.String lemma)
                          throws JHWNLException
Returns all Synset with the specified POS containing the root form of lemma as a word. Morphed forms of words will be stemmed to obtain the root word before searching.

Parameters:
pos - the part-of-speech of the word to look up
lemma - the lemma to look up
Returns:
IndexWord the IndexWord found by the lookup procedure, or null if an IndexWord is not found
Throws:
JHWNLException

lookupAllIndexWords

public IndexWordSet lookupAllIndexWords(java.lang.String lemma)
                                 throws JHWNLException
Return a set of IndexWords, with each element in the set corresponding to all distinct POS in which synsets are present for the lemma.

Parameters:
lemma - the word for which to lookup senses
Returns:
An IndexWordSet, containing many IndexWords each of which is a sense of lemma
Throws:
JHWNLException

lookupMorphedIndexWords

public IndexWordSet lookupMorphedIndexWords(POS pos,
                                            java.lang.String lemma)
                                     throws JHWNLException
Return a set of IndexWords, with each element in the set corresponding to all distinct root forms of the lemma found after Morphological Processing.

Parameters:
pos - the part-of-speech of the word to look up
lemma - the lemma to look up
Returns:
IndexWord the IndexWord found by the lookup procedure, or null if an IndexWord is not found
Throws:
JHWNLException

lookupAllMorphedIndexWords

public IndexWordSet lookupAllMorphedIndexWords(java.lang.String lemma)
                                        throws JHWNLException
Returns a set of IndexWord for all root forms of the lemma for all available POS in which Synsets are present for the lemma.

Parameters:
lemma - the word for which to lookup senses
Returns:
An array of IndexWords, each of which is a sense of word
Throws:
JHWNLException
